mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (id, listImg, detailImg, title, contents, regDt, regId, updateDt, updateId, useYn) VALUES(#{id}, #{listImg}, #{detailImg}, #{title}, #{contents}, now(), 99999, now(), 99999, "Y")
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM event ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT e.id AS id, e.title AS title, e.regDt AS regDt, i.`path` AS imgPath FROM event e JOIN img i ON e.listImg = i.imgGroupId ORDER BY regDt DESC
SELECT e.id AS id, e.title AS title, e.contents AS contents, i.`path` AS imgPath FROM event e JOIN img i ON e.detailImg = i.imgGroupId WHERE e.id = #{value}
